sections.title: Welcome to Blooming Wonders
sections.subtitle: Your One-Stop Flower Shop!
sections.name: Hero Section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Discover the enchanting world of Blooming Wonders, where every petal tells a story. Explore our wide selection of blooming flowers that bring warmth and joy to your spaces.

images.name: Main Flower Banner
images.description: A vibrant display of colorful flowers in full bloom.

sections.title: Our Story
sections.subtitle: A Tradition of Floral Excellence
sections.name: About Us
sections.label: About
sections.content: Blooming Wonders was founded with a passion for nature's artistry—flowers. We are committed to delivering the freshest, most exquisite flowers to our community, hand-picked by our expert florists. From humble beginnings to becoming a beloved neighborhood shop, our journey has been fueled by a love for sharing beauty and joy.

images.name: Flower Shop Interior
images.description: Beautifully arranged flowers in a cozy shop setting.

sections.title: Our Blossoming Services
sections.subtitle: Tailored to Your Needs
sections.name: Our Services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Floral Arrangements
* Custom bouquets for special occasions
* Seasonal specials and thematic flowers

### Wedding Floral Design
* Personalized consultations
* Unique, handcrafted designs

### Flower Delivery Service
* Same-day delivery options
* Surprise your loved ones with doorstep blossoms

images.name: Floral Arrangement
images.description: A stunning assortment of custom-crafted bouquets.

sections.title: Gallery of Petals
sections.subtitle: A Visual Symphony
sections.name: Gallery
sections.label: Gallery
sections.content: Feast your eyes on our gallery showcasing a symphony of colors with our exceptional floral designs. Each bouquet tells its own story, crafted with love and creativity.

images.name: Wedding Bouquet
images.description: Elegant wedding bouquet with pastel flowers.

images.name: Table Arrangement
images.description: Bright, seasonal arrangement perfect for any occasion.
